H0.text: Otis Barton was a pioneer in exploring where. Space

H1.text: Otis Barton was a pioneer in exploring where. Desert

H2.text: Otis Barton was a pioneer in exploring where. Jungle

H3.text: Otis Barton was a pioneer in exploring where. Undersea

A4.text: Barton set a world record with a 4,500 foot (1,372â€¯m) dive in the Pacific Ocean.

A5.text: Like Beebe, Barton was also interested in exploring tropical rain forests, and spent considerable time in places like Gabon.

A6.text: In 1930 Beebe and Barton reached a depth of 435 m (1,427 ft).

A7.text: There is no record of Otis Barton exploring outer space; all his expeditions were marine.
